flawed_nl_solution:
She has 180 minutes to do work because 3 times 60 equals <<3*60=180>>180
She has already spent 105 minutes on homework because 45 plus 30 plus 50 plus 25 equals <<45+30+50+25=105>>105
She has 75 minutes to finish her project because 180 minus 105 equals <<180-105=75>>75.
#### 75

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
